prefuse.util.ui
Class JToggleGroup

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  prefuse.util.ui.JToggleGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JToggleGroup
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Swing component representing a group of toggle buttons -- either checkboxes or radio buttons. This class uses a ListModel and ListSelectionModel to represent the selection state of the buttons.

Author:
jeffrey heer
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

JToggleGroup

public JToggleGroup(int type,
                    java.lang.Object[] data)
Create a new JToggleGroup.

Parameters:
type - the toggle button type to use, one of CHECKBOX or RADIO
data - the list data that should populate the toggle group

JToggleGroup

public JToggleGroup(int type,
                    javax.swing.ListModel data)
Create a new JToggleGroup.

Parameters:
type - the toggle button type to use, one of CHECKBOX or RADIO
data - the list model data backing the toggle group

JToggleGroup

public JToggleGroup(int type,
                    javax.swing.ListModel data,
                    javax.swing.ListSelectionModel selection)
Create a new JToggleGroup.

Parameters:
type - the toggle button type to use, one of CHECKBOX or RADIO
data - the list model data backing the toggle group
selection - the list selection model to use to monitor selection changes to the various toggle buttons.
